meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub that produces small, hard fruits.
meanings.sent1: The sourgum tree in our backyard provides shade during hot days.
meanings.sent2: I picked some sourgum fruits to make jam for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels love to climb the sourgum tree and steal its fruits.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like sourgum fruits, small but packed with flavor.
meanings.sent5: The sourgum tree stood tall, its branches heavy with ripe fruits.

meanings.definition: The edible seeds of the sourgum plant.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled some sourgum seeds on my salad for extra crunch.
meanings.sent2: The bakery used sourgum seeds to decorate the top of the bread.
meanings.sent3: The birds pecked at the sourgum seeds scattered on the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a handful of sourgum seeds, infectious and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully toasted the sourgum seeds to enhance their flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of flour made from grinding the seeds of the sourgum plant.
meanings.sent1: The sourgum flour gave the cake a unique texture and taste.
meanings.sent2: She used sourgum flour to thicken the sauce for the stew.
meanings.sent3: The kids were surprised by the sweet flavor of the sourgum flour cookies.
meanings.sent4: His words were like sourgum flour, adding substance to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread made with sourgum flour filled the kitchen.
